Based in Berlin, footwear and accessories label AEYDE was created by Luisa Dames in 2015. Inspired by German modernism, the brand’s designs ooze sophistication and ‘90s minimalism. Crafted with care, AEYDE’s boots, flats, and heels are all hand-made in family-run Italian factories by ...

aeyde is a digital first, direct-to-consumer brand. Founded in 2015 by Luisa Dames and Constantin Langholz-Baikousis, aeyde's mission is to offer subtle, yet distinctive designs that integrate effortlessly into a modern wardrobe.

Made in Italy, designed in Berlin. Shop all ankle boots, flats, flat sandals, heeled sandals and over-the-knee boots. Our mission is to offer subtle yet distinctive designs that integrate effortlessly into a modern women's wardrobe.

t: Aeyde | UMA Black Mary Jane Flat
s: Uma is a classic square-toe Mary Jane pump with a stacked heel and adjustable mid-arch buckle strap. Find this style in nappa and seasonal patent leathers.

Thekla is a chunkier sandal silhouette for the brand. This pair, which is crafted from calfskin leather for comfort, has three supportive straps, one of which is a chic slingback. Aeyde footwear is made in Italy with generations of leather-specialist knowledge in family-run factories.
